Field.Description: It is a parameter that identifies the character of the "riding side" when riding.
It is a parameter that identifies the character of the "riding side" when riding.
It is a parameter to change the camera parameter at the time of riding to a dedicated camera. It is a parameter for PC only, and it does not work even if it is set to the enemy.

Field.DisplayName: Riding side_Riding animation type and direction variable value
Field.Description: It is a parameter to rewrite the value of variable "RideOnAnimId" set in "RideOn (playback during riding) state" of the tool "HavokAnimationTool (HAT)" that controls character animation playback.

Field.DisplayName: Riding side_Riding animation type and direction variable value
Field.Description: It is a parameter to rewrite the value of variable "RiddenOnAnimId" set in "RiddenOn (playback when riding) state" of the tool "HavokAnimationTool (HAT)" that controls character animation playback.

Field.DisplayName: Alignment of the rider at the start of riding animation Damipoli ID
Field.Description: This is a Damipoli setting that is required only for the rider (the rider's character does not need to be set).

Field.DisplayName: Riding judgment _ Judgment criteria of the rider Damipoli ID
Field.Description: There is no need to set Damipoli for the character on the riding side.

Field.DisplayName: Riding judgment_Front judgment angle range on the riding side [deg]
Field.Description: Judgment is made by the angle difference between the [direction] on the riding side and the "front judgment Damipoly ID" on the riding side. The higher the value, the more you can ride even if you are facing away.
It is a parameter that determines the "mountable distance to the target"
Is it possible to ride even if the target to be ridden is above the target to be ridden? Is set in meters
Is it possible to ride even if the target to be ridden is below the target to be ridden? Is set in meters

Field.DisplayName: Riding judgment_angle difference range between objects min [deg]
Field.Description: In what range (angle) of the rider can ride? Set the minimum value of

Field.Description: In what range (angle) of the rider can ride? Set the maximum value of
